items.title: Custom Earrings
items.caption: Aana Silver Plated Floral Design Hanging Pink And Green Color Enamel Painted Silver Beads Dangler Earring

description.value: Custom Earrings
Aana Silver Plated Floral Design Hanging Pink And Green Color Enamel Painted Silver Beads Dangler Earring

This earring from Aana western jewellery collection will add a fashionable twist. This earring can be worn with any casual or formal dress. This earring can be teamed with slim jeans and a formal top for a chic work ensemble.

items.title: Custom Earrings
items.caption: Avismaya Gold Plated Multicolor Moon Stone Dangler Earring

description.value: Custom Earrings
Avismaya Gold Plated Multicolor Moon Stone Dangler Earring

We provide a vast variety of contemporary designs with many Natural Druzy stones .This designer contemporary designs make you feel like a princess wearing natural stoned jewellery. Match it with all of your designer wears and flaunt your style.

items.title: Custom Earrings
items.caption: Gold Plated Pink Color Straight Vine Beaded Tassel Design Dangler Earrings By Cippele

description.value: Custom Earrings
Gold Plated Pink Color Straight Vine Beaded Tassel Design Dangler Earrings By Cippele

Get the look that makes people turn around and appreciate your charm. Put on this beautiful earring that brings out the best of your beauty and charm. Starting off with a classy faux pearl on the earlobe and drooling down are multi layered vines of beads making the earring extremely unique, yet making the presence felt with its grace, class and amazing design!

items.title: Fabric Face Mask
items.caption: Hand sewn face masks made at home!

description.value: Fabric Face Mask
Hand sewn face masks made at home!
2 layer fabric face covering.
We recommend you to wash the mask after each use.
DISCLAIMER: these are not medical grade masks, intended for short daily use. Please wash & disinfect before first use.
Please note returns are not accepted on this item for hygiene and health reasons.
